summary: RT, originally known as Russia Today, is a Russian government-funded international news network. It broadcasts in several languages and provides online content. RT is owned by TV-Novosti, which is controlled by the Russian government. The network has been criticized for spreading propaganda, disinformation, and conspiracy theories. It has faced regulations and bans in many countries, including Ukraine, Latvia, Lithuania, Germany, and Canada, due to its biased reporting and misleading content. During the Russian invasion of Ukraine, RT's access was restricted on social media platforms and app stores.
title: RT (TV network)
